reviewText: This is classic Jack Lemmon. The plotline is silly at times, but performances by Shirley Maclaine and Jack Lemmon are worth it. Glad to see this on DVD. If you enjoy other comedies from the 60's you will like this one.

I have always enjoyed watching this film. I don't think I have ever seen a Billy Wilder movie I didn't like. This has been one of my favorites. I am glad I was able to purchase it from amazon.com to add to my collection.
